summary:
- **Revenue (FY25):** AUD 545.6m (+14.6% YoY)  
- **Net Profit After Tax (FY25):** AUD 94.1m (+85.6% YoY)  
- **Dividends (FY25):**  
  - Interim: 32.0 cps (100% franked, paid 28 Mar 2025)  
  - Final: 36.0 cps (100% franked, declared but unpaid at 30 Jun 2025)  
- **Net Tangible Assets (NTA) per share:** AUD 12.86 (vs. AUD 11.55 in FY24)  
- **Closing cash balance:** Not disclosed (refer to Annual Report)  

*Note: Additional operational/financial details likely in linked reports (Media Release, Annual Report), but not provided in this extract.*
